content: Is there any documentation/reading material that details how the equation compiler does its thing?
Let's just say there's a good reason we want to replace it

Oh word. Is the desire to redo/simplify it or replace it with something else entirely? I like some of the user-facing ideas it presents quite a bit, but it can feel black box-ish at times (hence the docs question).
I believe the plan is to both simplify it and make it customizable. Then users can implement the complicated rules themselves if they really need them, haha
That would be really interesting. Does that also mean it could potentially be implemented in Lean?
